shows.title: Stranger Things
shows.description: A group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits in their small town of Hawkins.
shows.creator: The Duffer Brothers

shows.title: Breaking Bad
shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to secure his family's financial future as he battles terminal cancer.
shows.creator: Vince Gilligan

shows.title: Manifest
shows.description: Passengers on a turbulent flight discover that five years have passed when they land, leading them to uncover a mysterious phenomenon.
shows.creator: Jeff Rake

shows.title: From
shows.description: Residents of a mysterious town find themselves trapped and must unravel the mysteries of their nightmarish reality while fighting to escape.
shows.creator: John Griffin

shows.title: Peaky Blinders
shows.description: A gangster family epic set in Birmingham, England, following a gang's rise to power during the aftermath of World War I.
shows.creator: Steven Knight
